attributes.action: Vote of no confidence in the government and to call another general election
attributes.additional_details: Because they are not fit for purpose and we think the general public feel they are not working for the good of the country
attributes.background: Call a general election as the current government is not fit for purpose

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Call a General Election
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700143
